thread.section_title: Servicecaster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servicecaster | servicecaster.com
thread.title: Dick

author: Dick
title: Dick
text:
I used these wheels under my fireplace log rack. Solves the problem of having log racks in the way. We keep the racks on the back deck when not using them. Then for winter we move them close to an outside door close to the fireplace.
The log racks aren't made for wheels but I adapted the racks to the wheels and it was very easy to do.
I have two more racks and I may put wheels under those also.
